title: Looking for Gold+ Support main to Duo with
body:
Hey, I'm an ADC main who was plat 1 last season and in a bit of a rutt lately, I'm in G3 at the moment as a scrub and in dire need of a support to duo with. 

IGN: Gnarmy of one

replies.body: Are you still looking for someone? I'm Gold I - II, mid/supp main; Add me - "Yalkara"

I'm G5 at the moment, was G1 but stopped playing
Getting back into it now
Add me on league if you like :)
